subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Hotels and Motels
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: During the N.B.A. lockout, room rates at downtown hotels that were near the Thunder’s arena were going for about $100 less than this time last year.
snippet: During the N.B.A. lockout, room rates at downtown hotels that were near the Thunder’s arena were going for about $100 less than this time last year.
